title: Length Converter (m, km, miles, feet, inches, cm)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: meters = value × factorToMeter[sourceUnit] target value = meters ÷ factorToMeter[targetUnit] Example: 5 miles to km: 5 × 1609.344 = 8046.72 m 8046.72 ÷ 1000 = 8.04672 km

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
